segments.text: John , why don ’ t you go and do some gardening ? The lawn needs weeding .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because I ’ m not in the mood , that ’ s why .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , don ’ t just sit there , do something . Come and help me in the kitchen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Help you in the kitchen , I don ’ t feel like it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to clear the table then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? Do I have to do it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not , if you don ’ t want to .
segments.speaker: S1
